title: UEFA ( Union of European Football Associations ) total revenue 2004 to 2018
summary: This statistic shows the revenue of the fc barcelona from the 2005/06 season to the 2018/19 season . According to Deloitte , in the 2018/19 season the revenue of the Spanish football club grew by 22 percent , to 840.8 million euros , with record matchday and commercial revenue for a football club . fc barcelona - additional information fc barcelona 's brand and team value increased significantly in 2014 , thanks in part to the high-profile signing of Luis Suarez from Liverpool fc in 2014 .
gold: This statistic shows the total revenue of the UEFA from the 2004/05 season to the 2017/18 season . The season runs from July 1 to June 30 of the following year . The revenue of the 2017/18 season was 2.79 billion euros .
